extensionDescription.message: Uploads your large attachments to your OwnCloud and instead inserts a link into your email.

serverURLDesc.message: The base URL of the OwnCloud server

tokenDesc.message: An app token (preferrable) or password. (Generate an OwnCloud app token via User -> Settings -> Security -> App Token)  WARNING: this token is stored insecurely.

pathDesc.message: The path where the files are stored in OwnCloud (must begin and end with a '/')
